## Description of Work

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is conducting an annual financial audit of the Government of Canada’s Consolidated Financial Statements. The OAG requires the services of one Senior Auditor to assist the audit team in conducting the audit work related to the annual financial audit, in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards and OAG audit and documentation standards.

This Request for Proposal (RFP) describes the process for selecting a supplier to provide the required auditing services. The RFP is open only to qualified Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who have been invited to submit a proposal. The successful supplier will be awarded a contract for the period of Contract award to 31 August 2023.
